newsitem.title: IRAN: Iran hangs six for for murder, spares two.
newsitem.headline: Iran hangs six for for murder, spares two.

text.p: Iran executed six men for murder and pardoned two other people, the Iran Daily newspaper said on Thursday.
The paper said the convicts were hanged at Tehran's Qasr prison, but did not say when this took place.
One of the poeple pardoned was a woman convicted of murdering her husband, the paper said.
Under Iran's Islamic law, relatives of a murder victim can accept money in exchange for forgoing the death penalty.
